channel.title: RuneOrigin || VPS || Fullscreen || 317 || PI ||
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i1169.photobucket.com/albums/r510/martydoom4u/RuneOrigin/2retu05_zpsf8fca242.png[/img] hello there , my name is Evolution and i started an server with a good friend, called valid (ofcourse not his real name) a long time we developed Santa-X what whas realy fun sorry about my grammer :$ we wanted to start over again with another client and base and evreything and code hard whe are sourching for some mature java programmers for server side and client side we got load stuff to do and we use dropbox to code so evreybody can code at the same. our new home is in progress and far from done somet higns we have done - made an door system for single and double doors (even the bandos door works) - removed the OverPowered starting stuff, - improved system on dual arena. - worked on our ideas - added new emote sprites - worked on the player files so the charachter files would be more stable we got alot to do and alot is already done Ty to Gabe our base we are working from is called InsanityX Few features: Switching No DC's - very stable Mem usage fixed (Client mem leak fixed - creds to arrowzflame) Fullscreen in webclient WITH NO FUCKING LAG - this is not zepsipy/formationx fullscreen crap, this has no lag and works bug free, this was nr 1 feature on the server Quick prayers and curses 100% client sided saving ect User & pass saves World switching (1 is regular world and 2 is developers wich is set to localhost) Custom minigames such as new fightcaves for new rs firecape Barbarien assault Redone Dungeoneering with no smuggling, even if someone manages to smuggle there are around 10 checks, example if a player logsin with dung items outside of dung they will be banned automaticly. Most skills 100% like rs such as firemaking, woodcutting ,mining, cooking ect. All dupes patched (Paid over 10 people to find dupes, none was found) MUCH MUCH MORE.. from original post from insanityX Media : (all images have been shrink) the home area [IMG]http://i1169.photobucket.com/albums/r510/martydoom4u/RuneOrigin/screen1fin_zps485119cf.png[/img] search function working [IMG]http://i1169.photobucket.com/albums/r510/martydoom4u/RuneOrigin/screen2fin_zps4c0fa08f.png[/img] our login and bg (the old name whas rune ville) [IMG]http://i1169.photobucket.com/albums/r510/martydoom4u/RuneOrigin/screen3fin_zpsec944cab.png[/img] skillcapes emotes working + new emote sprites [IMG]http://i1169.photobucket.com/albums/r510/martydoom4u/RuneOrigin/screen4fin_zpsfe13a7db.png[/img] working summoning (working on clipping) [IMG]http://i1169.photobucket.com/albums/r510/martydoom4u/RuneOrigin/screen5fin_zps7fce6997.png[/img] storing working for sumonning [IMG]http://i1169.photobucket.com/albums/r510/martydoom4u/RuneOrigin/screen6fin_zps42a47f40.png[/img] jad working [IMG]http://i1169.photobucket.com/albums/r510/martydoom4u/RuneOrigin/screen7fin_zpsc9763137.png[/img] you win this if you beat him up [IMG]http://i1169.photobucket.com/albums/r510/martydoom4u/RuneOrigin/screen8fin_zps27ef2636.png[/img] corp (i died) [IMG]http://i1169.photobucket.com/albums/r510/martydoom4u/RuneOrigin/screen9fin_zps381b462d.png[/img] daganoth kings (i died again) [IMG]http://i1169.photobucket.com/albums/r510/martydoom4u/RuneOrigin/screen10fin_zpse5a5ae9d.png[/img] kbd (i died again.....) [IMG]http://i1169.photobucket.com/albums/r510/martydoom4u/RuneOrigin/screen11fin_zpse295e8c5.png[/img] tormented demons [IMG]http://i1169.photobucket.com/albums/r510/martydoom4u/RuneOrigin/screen12fin_zpsbe12eede.png[/img] mage bank [IMG]http://i1169.photobucket.com/albums/r510/martydoom4u/RuneOrigin/screen13fin_zps9540fbb0.png[/img] barrows [IMG]http://i1169.photobucket.com/albums/r510/martydoom4u/RuneOrigin/screen14fin_zps22790ef3.png[/img] our dual arena area (original) [IMG]http://i1169.photobucket.com/albums/r510/martydoom4u/RuneOrigin/screen15fin_zpsc539cff3.png[/img] view your armour and your stats [IMG]http://i1169.photobucket.com/albums/r510/martydoom4u/RuneOrigin/screen16fin_zps95e7b4cf.png[/img] items kept on death [IMG]http://i1169.photobucket.com/albums/r510/martydoom4u/RuneOrigin/screen17fin_zps4dcb56f4.png[/img] fullscreen (working in webclient) [IMG]http://i1169.photobucket.com/albums/r510/martydoom4u/RuneOrigin/screen18fin_zpsc313fe0b.png[/img] new options menu [IMG]http://i1169.photobucket.com/albums/r510/martydoom4u/RuneOrigin/screen19fin_zps732a2de9.png[/img] [size=24pt]wanna join this amazing project?[/size] we are looking for Server Side Programmers [3/3] (valid, evolution, Master CoderZ) Client Side Programmers [1/4](evolution) website devloper (php,html programmer)[0/2] (might be one, or you should work 2geter) beta testers [2/20] reply to this topic and fill out this
My name is: applying for: my age is : I can work (hours): I can work (days): Some experience: Skype: msn:
hopefull see you soon :)

item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

Name: David
Skype: Rune-X
Years programming: 2-3
Have you done any work outside of RSPS? I am taking a course atm where we learn to program with java
Time zone: North American Eastern Time Zone
List some work you have done in RSPS: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,530760.msg3911191.html#msg3911191 This is my project from a long time ago
What can you do for this development?: I could help program the server also do a little graphics work at the same time
What kind of work would you prefer doing for Oremptius (Client, core, content development, etc.)?: I could some server sided, more of client sided such as interfaces and stuff

@ForsaKenX0 wrote:

My name is: Tyler
applying for: Website Developer/Beta Tester
my age is : 16, turning 17 in 3 days.
I can work (hours): Week days - 4-5 hours. Weekends - 6-7 hours. Depending on my plans for the day.
I can work (days): 6/7 days. I usually have a lazy day on Sundays. If I’m needed, I’ll work Sundays.
Some experience: I’ve released a few small little templates around Mopar/Rune-Serber. PM me for a link to a few sites I’ve made. PHP: Not an expert. Still learning, but I consider myself half-decent. I know how to use SMF very well, and I know a little about how to use IP.B
Skype: PM
msn: dfismypk@hotmail.com

item.title: RuneOrigin || VPS || Fullscreen || 317 || PI ||
item.dc:creator: @theowned theowned
item.description:
@theowned wrote:

2retu05_zpsf8fca242.png832×300

hello there , my name is Evolution and i started an server with a good friend, called valid (ofcourse not his real name)
a long time we developed Santa-X what whas realy fun
sorry about my grammer
we wanted to start over again with another client and base and evreything and code hard
whe are sourching for some mature java programmers for server side and client side
we got load stuff to do and we use dropbox to code so evreybody can code at the same.

our new home is in progress and far from done

somet higns we have done

  • made an door system for single and double doors (even the bandos door works)
  • removed the OverPowered starting stuff,
  • improved system on dual arena.
  • worked on our ideas
  • added new emote sprites
  • worked on the player files so the charachter files would be more stable

we got alot to do and alot is already done Ty to Gabe

our base we are working from is called InsanityX

Few features:
Switching
No DC’s - very stable
Mem usage fixed (Client mem leak fixed - creds to arrowzflame)
Fullscreen in webclient WITH NO FUCKING LAG - this is not zepsipy/formationx fullscreen crap, this has no lag and works bug free, this was nr 1 feature on the server
Quick prayers and curses 100% client sided saving ect
User & pass saves
World switching (1 is regular world and 2 is developers wich is set to localhost)
Custom minigames such as new fightcaves for new rs firecape
Barbarien assault
Redone Dungeoneering with no smuggling, even if someone manages to smuggle there are around 10 checks, example if a player logsin with dung items outside of dung they will be banned automaticly.
Most skills 100% like rs such as firemaking, woodcutting ,mining, cooking ect.
All dupes patched (Paid over 10 people to find dupes, none was found)
MUCH MUCH MORE…
from original post from insanityX

Media :

(all images have been shrink)

the home area

search function working

our login and bg (the old name whas rune ville)

skillcapes emotes working + new emote sprites

working summoning (working on clipping)

storing working for sumonning

jad working

you win this if you beat him up

corp (i died)

daganoth kings (i died again)

kbd (i died again…)

tormented demons

mage bank

barrows

our dual arena area (original)

view your armour and your stats

items kept on death

fullscreen (working in webclient)

new options menu

[size=24pt]wanna join this amazing project?[/size]

we are looking for

Server Side Programmers [3/3] (valid, evolution, Master CoderZ)
Client Side Programmers 1/4
website devloper (php,html programmer)[0/2] (might be one, or you should work 2geter)
beta testers [2/20]

reply to this topic and fill out this

My name is: applying for: my age is : I can work (hours): I can work (days): Some experience: Skype: msn:

hopefull see you soon

Read full topic
